titleInfo.title: 1980s professional photos for press releases, book covers, etc [ca 1980-1984]

mods.abstract: Image of Dr. Robert S. Mendelsohn wearing a laboratory coat in a maternity ward room, standing to the right of a woman in glasses who is holding a baby. Dr. Mendelsohn appears to be holding the baby's hand.
mods.accessCondition: Item digitized for access and research purposes only. Copyright retained by Robert S. Mendelsohn Estate. For all other uses, contact archives@yorku.ca.
